narrative.narrative: Lufttransport is a Norwegian helicopter and fixed-wing airline that operates primarily air ambulance helicopters and planes for the Norwegian and Swedish governments. In addition the airline offers services including surveillance for the Norwegian Coast Guard, transport of ship pilots and scheduled air transport in the Norwegian territory of Svalbard.

prefereds.aircrafts: Beechcraft King Air B200,AgustaWestland AW139,EC225 Super Puma,Dornier 228-212
